tooltip.newCardsPerDay: The number of new cards that should appear during review
tooltip.easyRate: The multiplier for the 'easy' answer, used during calculation of the next review date
tooltip.hardRate: The multiplier for the 'hard' answer, used during calculation of the next review date
tooltip.maxInterval: The maximum interval (in days) that can be used in determining the date of the next review
tooltip.minIntervalIncrease: The minimum interval increase (in days) used in determining the date of the next review (applies only to non-new cards and correct answers)
tooltip.globalEaseModifier: The multiplier used during calculation of the next review date for correct answers
tooltip.intervalRateAfterFail: Multiplier used in calculating the date of the next review if the threshold of incorrect answers is exceeded
tooltip.leechThreshold: Threshold of failed answers after which card is marked as leech
tooltip.newCardSteps: For each new card, you must give as many correct answers in a row as the number of steps defined

tooltip.maxInterval: The maximum interval (in days) that can be used in determining the date of the next review
tooltip.intervalRateAfterFail: Multiplier used in calculating the date of the next review if the threshold of incorrect answers is exceeded
tooltip.failThreshold: Threshold of incorrect answers after which use case review is considered as failed
tooltip.exercisesPerDay: The number of exercises that should be performed as part of the review of a given use case; the date of the next review is calculated after passing this threshold
